title: We're almost in Season 7 and Teemo still is trash tier
body:
List of buffs that Teemo deserves:

* Passive stealth instantly in brush
* Toxic shot applying to abilities
* Toxic shot applying spell effects
* Mushrooms back to 10 minutes
* Mushrooms back to 80% AP ratio
* Blinding dart applying near sight
* Increase attack range to 550 to match other marksmen
* Mushrooms not disabled by trinket shit (just revealed)

replies.body:
"Mushrooms back to 10 minutes"

Please go burn with your master in the infernal depths.
Teemo has 51 win rate right now plus he is more popular than ever.

> [{quoted}](name=Wilbor,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=n1ZYksEA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-31T15:29:39.089+0000)
>
> Teemo has 51 win rate right now plus he is more popular than ever.

Yeah I can tell he was in dominating in lcs
LCS is not real league. LCS is all about team comps, teamfights and funneling gold and XP to the 2 carries.
Non-believers. Play some rank before you hate on the Devil. He got me plat last season.
5% pickrate with a 51% winrate is not "trash-tier".
